data.text: @JavedPsychia Sir, we appreciate you taking the time to meet our arrivals team at Jorhat. While we always strive to provide a pleasant experience when traveling with us, we regret the inconvenience caused to the passenger. 1/2
@SharmaGalaxy Ms Sharma, we request you to share more details on your concern with us over DM along with your contact details so we may assist you. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@paststat @JM_Scindia @nsitharaman Mr Reddy, we believe one of our team members called to address your concern in this regard. Further, your feedback is duly noted which will help us in bringing more advanced & modern methods of payment in our system in the coming days. ~Linda

data.text: @PVENKAT78399268 Sir, please be informed that only electric heater is allowed to carry in check-in baggage. ~Sheetal

@spradhan1210 Ms Pradhan, we certainly do not intend to provide such an experience and would like to look into this further. Could you please DM us your PNR so we can look into this further? ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@UrmiBhattacha10 Ma'am, we understand your concern here. However, to claim the refund, please connect with the concerned travel agency. ~Sheetal

@Footlooseand @ProsaicView @DewdropsInApril Ms Dutta, we understand how inconvenient it must have been without the baggage. We see the baggage has been delivered now. We sincerely regret the hassle & look forward to delivering better services in the future. ~Linda
@shreyaslohar Sir, a bonafide school/university ID is mandatory which the passenger has to show at the time of check-in. Please visit https://t.co/3cJbkk5ZHl - "student fare" for details. ~Sheetal

urls.title: 6E Fares, Fare discounts on different categories | IndiGo

data.text: @niadongare12 Ma'am, we understand how you must be feeling. Please be informed that our team is looking into it and we request you to kindly revert to the trailing mail for further assistance on this. ~Sheetal
@EnglishHelpline Mr Gill, your feedback is well noted and will be certainly shared with our concerned team for further review and action. ~Yashica

@lovish_sardana @DGCAIndia @AAI_Official @PMOIndia Mr Sardana, we understand the pain of missing the flight. As checked, you reported late for the flight, therefore, our team was unable to accept you for the same flight. Please note check-in gate closes 1 hour prior to the departure. ~ Sheetal

data.text: @Anushree97 Hello, we regret the delayed response. We believe one of our staff at the airport assisted him after the arrival of the aircraft and the wheelchair was provided. Do let us know for further assistance. ~Diyashi

@NmtvGanga Sir, we understand to disappointment. Please know, our check -in counter closes 60 mins prior to the departure.  We try to accept customers till certain time. However, it is not possible all the time.  We look forward to your understanding. ~Diyashi
@JonBonJobhi Hi, this is certainly not good to hear. Did you inform our airport team? Please let us know in detail along with the PNR. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@krishna1715 Sir, what happened? Please share your concern with us via DM so we may closely look into it and resolve this for you at the earliest. ~Sheetal
@pradeepagpka @DGCAIndia Mr Agarwal, we understand the trouble caused here. Please be informed that our team is working on it and we shall get you in the air shortly. ~Sheetal

@arunneel2701 Sir, it is never our intention to disrupt your travel plans. Our operations are dependent on various factors some of which are beyond our control that may affect our schedule. Our team is trying their best to get you in the air as soon as possible.  ~Sheetal

@krishnendu623 Sir, we never want our customers to feel this way and we would like to have a closer look into this on priority. Meanwhile, please drop your PNR via DM so we may get this checked. ~Sheetal
@VSVENKS Sir, we would like to connect with you on this right away, please help us with your contact details via DM. Thanks! ~Sheetal
@Curioussouya We are glad to know that, Mr Yadav. We wish to see you onboard soon, again! ~Sheetal
@shree_37 Hello, we understand your concern. We have added new meals on our menu, please visit https://t.co/QAARrxLDHc to know more. ~Diyashi

data.text: @PolkEvent430 We regret the inconvenience. Could you please share your PNR so we may check and assist you. ~Diyashi
@buffetmojo Hello, we are getting this checked. Allow us some time to get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi
@DevlinChanda Hello, you just made the day better. Could you please share your PNR via DM, so we share the appreciation to the concerned team. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@golmaal007 We regret the inconvenience cause. We have duly noted your concern. Hoping to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi
@manseebal We regret to hear this. We have noted your concern and shall raise it to the team. Hoping to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi
@AvaniLekhara We are always here for you, Ms Lekhara. Thank you for sending us some love today. Hope to see you onboard again real soon 😊❤️ #GoIndiGo
@AbhishekM1976 We regret to hear this, sir. We are getting this checked. Allow us some time to get it checked and get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi

@NaraayanKannan We regret the inconvenience caused to you. Could you please share your PNR via DM, so we may raise the the matter with the concerned team. Hopping so serve you in a hassle free way in future. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@neelraghavan We regret to hear this, sir. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we may get it checked and get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@SaranRa35953462 Hello, we have noted your suggestion and shall raise it with the concerned team. Stay tuned. Thank you. ~Diyashi
@vinaychopda We regret to hear this, sir. Could you please share your concern in details along with your PNR so we may check and raise it with the concerned team. ~Diyashi
@DareDix Hello, let us get it checked and get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi
@stargazer248 We regret the inconvenience caused to you. Could you please share your PNR  via DM, so we may raise it with the concerned team. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@ImVikasT We regret the inconvenience caused, Mr Tripathi. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we may raise it with the concerned team. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
This is how we step up and step out. #goIndiGo https://t.co/VfwLXEDXLB
@KarthikV8589 We regret to see this, sir. This can be very disappointing. We are getting the matter checked. Allow us some time  to get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi
@AuthorVSundeep Hello, could you please share your details along with your PNR via DM so we may check and assist you. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@nakulberi We are disappointed to hear this, sir. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we raise it with the concerned team. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@sparekh12 Sir, we regret the delay. We are highlighting this with our concerned team right away.~ Nandita

@justabir Sir, we regret to see this. Please DM us the complaint acknowledgment copy (PIR) issued by our customer service team at the arrival airport for us to take a closer look and assist you.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

data.text: @BrajkishorTiwar Sir, we are concerned to know what went wrong. We request you to share your experience in detail so, we may look into it and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Intern3t4All We regret the inconvenience, sir. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we may get it checked. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@nimish_raj Sir, we regret the trouble. We request you to share your PNR via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@AdvSA07 We regret to hear this, sir. Could you please share your PNR via DM, so we may get it checked. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@puranjayrana We regret the inconvenience caused. We always try to be on time. As checked the flight got delayed due to late arrival of the aircraft. We look forward to your understanding. ~Diyashi
@HarshitS14 We regret to see this, sir. This is not the experience we intend to provide. Could you please share you PNR so we may share the same with the concerned team. ~Diyashi
@googlegupta We regret to hear this sir. Could you please share your PNR via DM, so we may share it with the concerned team. Hoping to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi

@nyk_pradeep22 Hello, you may carry the room heater in your check -in baggage if the same is not operated by batteries. ~Diyashi
@jaydevsheth Sir, please share your PNR via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Divyans26428508 Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused. Water bottle  have been discontinued on board. This is to ensure we contribute our best towards a greener tomorrow. ~Diyashi

data.text: @singh_kaura We regret to hear this, Mr kaura, could you please share your concern via DM so we may get it checked. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@icexvi Sir, we regret the trouble. We request you to share the screenshot of the error along with your PNR so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@mathur_rohan Mr Mathur, we regret to hear this. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we may check and assist you. ~Diyashi
  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@yerne_hemant Hello, please be informed that only 1 checked in baggage with not more that 15kg weight is allowed. Thank you. ~Diyashi
@Anushree97 MS Ganeriwal, we are disappointed to hear this. Could you please share the PNR via DM, so we may check and assist you. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@girishmeh7184 Mr Mehtani, we regret to hear this. As checked the aircraft was diverted to Hyderabad due to poor weather condition. We regret the inconvenience caused to you. ~Diyashi

@jaydevsheth Sir, dry coconut is a highly flammable object hence, carrying the same in check-in luggage is not permitted. It is only allowed to be carried if it is carried in small pieces. Further, certain items are subjected to airport security clearance. Hope you understand!~ Nandita
@Prateek012084 We shall share your feedback with the concerned team. Hoping to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi
@Harish04964397 Sir, we regret the trouble. We request you to allow us some time. Please know that our team is working on your concern and will get back to you with an update.~ Nandita

@bishworjit0303 Sir, we regret the delay. It is never our intention to disrupt passengers' travel plans. We always try our best to maintain our inflight schedule. We request you to DM us your PNR so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@ArnovSinha Sir, we regret the experience. Please know that any case of mishandled baggage needs to be informed at the time of arrival so, that our team can assist you with the same. Further, please DM us your PNR so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@vjvishaljain16 Sir, we regret to see this. We request you to share your PNR via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@NmtvGanga Sir, allow us some time to get it checked. ~Diyashi

@TuhinMehta We regret to hear this, Mr Mehta. We try our best to fly on time. As checked, the delay was due to the late arrival of the incoming aircraft. Further we have duly noted your feedback and share the same with the concerned team. Hoping to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi

@amdavadiZalak Hi Zalak, if both customers are travelling under the same PNR, in that case, you can club the Check-In Luggage and the baggage weight shouldn't exceed 30 kgs in total. We hope this helps. ~Navi

data.text: @zeeshanrk100 Mr Khan, we regret the inconvenience and request you to let us know in case you need more assistance. Thanks. ~Navi
@NmtvGanga Rest, Mr Ranu Singh may contact our Airport Team for further assistance with the changes and our Airport Team will assist him. (2/2) ~Navi

@NmtvGanga Sir, we pay our deepest condolences to the departed soul. Please be informed that our staff tries to accept every customer till a certain time limit. When it's not possible to accept the customers, taking a-lot of factors in account, they deny the check-in/ boarding. (1/2)
@DeenABAbdullah1 Mr Abdullah, we request you to DM us your PNR so we may check. Alternatively, you may also get in touch with our Airport Team for any real-time assistance. Thanks. ~Navi
@aliceho_1995 Hi, we regret to note this and request you to DM us your experience in detail, along with your PNR, so we may check on the same. Wishing you a comfortable time in the skies. ~Navi
@aftabparvez Mr Aftab, a wheelchair is already added for Mr Khan in his booking and customer may get in touch with any of our available staff at the Airport for assistance on the same. Thanks. ~Navi

data.text: @halderrupam2010 Mr Halder, we regret the inconvenience and will surely have your feedback shared with our Concerned Team to avoid the re-occurrence. Wishing you a comfortable time onboard our flight. ~Navi

@ankifunki Hi Ankit, CUTE stands for the 'Common User Terminal Equipment' charge. It is the amount that is charged for the use of metal-detecting machines, escalators, and other types of equipment used at airports. It is also referred to as a "Passenger Handling Fee". ~Navi
@jolly_virendra Sir, please let us know via DM if we may call you right away for assistance on your raised concern ? Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@Abhee_S Hi, we regret the experience you had and request you to DM us your PNR, so we may check on the same and assist. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@HimanshuR_27 Mr Raheja, liquid(s) above the quantity of 100 ML needs to be carried in the Check-In Luggage. Please visit https://t.co/46GsRa3B4w for more information on the same. Thanks. ~Navi

urls.title: Dangerous Goods, Things not allowed in flight | IndiGo
urls.description: Visit this page to know about which items are prohibited in checked and cabin baggage and what not? Get all information about our dangerous goods policy.

data.text: @Harshwardhan31 Hi, we'd like to look into this and request you to share your PNR and Contact Number via DM, so we may connect with you to assist. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@jolly_virendra Sir, we regret the inconvenience and request you to visit https://t.co/58PvLAZ8E3 to complete the Web Check-In. Please don't change the assigned seat and let us know via DM in case you face any issues. We look forward to having you onboard. ~Navi

urls.title: How to Check-in | Print Boarding Pass - IndiGo
urls.description: IndiGo offers you multiple check-in options. Save time by online check-in or using the IndiGo mobile app. You can also download & print boarding pass online.

data.text: @Adil_Husain_ Mr Husain, you are allowed to carry a 50000 mAh Powerbank, only in your Hand Luggage. We hope this helps. ~Navi

@rakeshkonni Sir, sorry for such an unpleasant experience. We have been taking all the necessary steps to control mosquitoes and only allow passengers to board once the fumigation is done. Please DM us your PNR so we may have your feedback shared. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@salimgbelim Mr Belim, your feedback is noted and we look forward to serving you in a better way, next time you travel with us. ~Navi

@AshviniSoni12 Ms Soni, our Airport Team may request passengers to check-in their Cabin Bags to avoid congestion in the overhead bins. Rest assured, we have relayed your feedback to our Airport Team and wish you a comfortable time onboard our flight. ~Navi

@VivekSoman11 Mr Soman, sorry for such an unpleasant experience. We have been taking all the necessary steps to control mosquitoes and only allow passengers to board once the fumigation is done. Did you alert the crew ? We'll also make sure to pass on your feedback. ~Navi
@rjain_dvlpr Yes Mr Jain, you can carry a 50000 mAh Powerbank in your Hand Luggage only. ~Navi
@RubikaLiyaquat We hope you will understand our policy limitations and will continue to give us opportunities to serve you. (2/2) ~Navi

@RubikaLiyaquat Ms Liyaquat, thank you for meeting our team at Delhi. We want all our customers to have a smooth Check-In experience. In an effort to make your travel easier, our team offered the best possible solution and requested for the excess baggage charges. (1/2)
@BaluniM Hi, we'd like to look into this and request you to DM us your PNR, so we may check on the same. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@Mogambomama Hi, we are concerned to note this and request you to share your PNR via DM so we may check on the same and share an appropriate feedback with the Respective Team. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@1907rish Sir, this is truly not the kind of experience we wish our customers to have. Please know that we are sharing the feedback with the relevant team for necessary review and action on this, meanwhile, please DM us your PNR. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Thareef8 Sir, we can truly understand your brother's anxiety here. Please share his PNR via DM so we may look into this on priority. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@iyeraghu It is surely the little things that count sometimes, Mr Iyer and we thank you for the acknowledging the same! 😊 ~Sheetal
@atti_cus Be assured, we will get the aircraft fumigated again. Hoping you'll give us another chance to serve you better when you fly with us next. ~Yashica <2/2>

errors.title: Not Found Error
